titles.title: Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2017
Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2017
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to increase the amount of compensation paid to chapter 7 bankruptcy trustees for services rendered.
Bankruptcy Administration Improvement Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

committee.subcommittee: Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law
committee.name: House Judiciary
